title: Before It Melts!
detail_text: <:th_ch0004/>Kasumi, you don’t have to eat in a hurry like that. The gelato isn’t going anywhere.<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0202/>Even if it’s not, it’s still melting! Look, yours is melting as we speak, Umi-senpai!<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0004/>Wawaah....!<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0202/>See, just like Kasumin said! We need to eat this delicious gelato while it’s still in its tasty form before it melts!<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0004/>I guess you’re right.... It’s slowly melting away.<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0202/>Well then~, should Kasumin help you with your pistachio gelato before it melts, Umi-senpai?<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0004/>Help me? ....Fufu, if you want a bite, just say it from the start. Come on, here.<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0202/>Yaaay, thanks for the food! *Munch*.... Hnn~, this one is delicious too~<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0004/>I’m glad. Ah, your vanilla one is slowly melting too, Kasumi.<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0202/>Waaaaah!!!<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0000/>Translated by SIFAStheatre and Idol Story<:dt_line_end/>
